enchantment.optional_enchants.ice_bow.de: Give slowness to your enemies when you shoot it.
enchantment.optional_enchants.ninja_styl: When you kill any mob or player, you gain a slight speed boost.
enchantment.optional_enchants.angry_lumb: When you kill any mob or player, you gain a slight haste boost.
enchantment.optional_enchants.betrayer.d: Increases damage dealt to Illager enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.end_harm.d: Increases damage dealt to End enemies
